The app is able to transform coordinates within EPSG , ESRI, IAU2000 references from online database, and convert X & Y coordinates, geodetic datums and projected systems.

summary.label:
"Кадастр: публичная кадастровая карта" (Kadastr) - доступ к публичным, открытым кадастровым сведениям реестра недвижимости, содержащимся в Публичной кадастровой карте России и Росреестре. Карта Росреестра предназначена для использования неограниченным кругом лиц, сведения карты являются общедоступными. Карта регулярно обновляется и актуализируется.



Для поиска объекта на карте укажите адрес или кадастровый номер. Кликните на земельный участок или дом (здание, строение, сооружение) для получения полной информации по объекту: площадь, статус, назначение, сведения о земельном участке, его кадастровой стоимости, площади, категории земель, разрешенном использовании и других характеристиках, внесенных в ЕГРН.

Какую информацию об объекте недвижимости можно бесплатно узнать в приложении:


- Кадастровую стоимость объектов недвижимости
- Сведения о форме собственности
- Виды разрешенного использования
- Кадастровые номера
- Назначение объектов недвижимости
- Площади объектов недвижимости



С помощью приложения возможно заказать отчет об объекте недвижимости на основе официальной информации из выписки ЕГРН и других открытых государственных баз данных.


Возможно заказать отчет:
- об основных характеристиках недвижимости
- о переходе прав собственности на любую недвижимость.
По запросу пользователя мы бесплатно предоставим выписку из ЕГРН, на основе которой формировался отчет.



Внимание!
Сервис не использует объекты интеллектуальной собственности Росреестра, а также не осуществляет деятельность по оказанию неограниченному кругу лиц государственной услуги по предоставлению сведений, содержащихся в ЕГРН.

Данный информационно - аналитический сервис не осуществляет перепродажу сведений из ЕГРН Росреестр. Оплата осуществляется за аналитический отчет об объекте недвижимости, у котором, помимо информации из ЕГРН, содержатся открытые данные из других государственных баз данных, например таких как ФССП. Выписка ЕГРН по запросу пользователя предоставляется ему бесплатно, что не запрещено законодательством РФ.



Отчёт — это выписка из ЕГРН?


Мы пользуемся выпиской ЕГРН для нашего отчёта, но собственно выпиской он не является.

Выписка ЕГРН — это официальный документ, предоставляемый Росреестром, в котором указан собственник недвижимости, дата регистрации, характеристики объекта недвижимости, возможные обременения, аресты, запрещения на сделки с ним (ипотека, рента и т.д.).

Отчет из ЕГРН об основных характеристиках будет полезна в случае совершения сделки с объектом недвижимости. Если заказать отчет из ЕГРН онлайн, то вы сможете оперативно узнать, кто собственник квартиры или земельного участка, нет ли в отношении объекта недвижимости судебных споров, арестов и т.п. Кроме того, отчет из ЕГРН может понадобиться по требованию банка, выдающего кредит под залог недвижимого имущества.

Стоит насторожиться, если переходы прав были частыми без имеющихся на то оснований. Atlas Navi is a Drive to Earn A.I. navigation app that uses live video from your smartphone camera to analyze the road in front of you and automatically detect: 
- traffic in each lane (counting how many vehicles are in each lane in front of you) 
- road construction / road work signs 
- road closures 
- accident detection 
- police vehicles (some countries only) 
- potholes 
- available / free parking space

The app uses advanced computer vision (A.I.) algorithms to analyze the video feeds from your smartphone camera and detect all the above problems on the road. It does this in the background, without interfering with the navigation instructions. 

Atlas Navi analyses the road 25 times per second when used with the camera from your smartphone. It generates 100 times better data than other navigation systems, which helps reroute other drivers to avoid potential traffic congestion and dangerous situations. 
Based on these A.I. detections, the app reroutes other drivers on quicker, safer, and less congested routes. 

Atlas Navi only uploads to the server the relevant information for traffic optimization: the type of detections and the GPS co-ordinates of said problem. No images or videos are uploaded unless specifically enabled by the user. If enabled, it can store your road trip recorded videos in the cloud, but the default option is to keep them on your device. 
Atlas Navi rewards drivers who send traffic data with a small amount of $NAVI for each mile they drive if they have a 3D vehicle selected in the app and provide traffic data from their cameras.

You can of course use Atlas Navi as a standard navigation app, without turning on the smartphone camera or the A.I. detections. You will benefit from all the rerouting and information received from other drivers which will make your route safer and faster. 

Current features include: 
- Navigation module with very accurate address search function 
- Video recording of your road trips, stored in the cloud or on the device 
- Trip history with associated videos (if any) 
- A.I. camera view - see what the camera is detecting in real time around you. 
- Livestream your road trip by sharing a simple link (the others don't need to download Atlas Navi) 
- Car garage where you can select from 3D vehicles in your garage. Customize, change their color, and choose which one you want to drive with today. 
- Rewards system - get rewarded in $NAVI if others join your Driving Club 
- Driving Club - see the others who have joined your personal club 
- Wallet - rewards earned and spent

Atlas Navi is adding more features on a bi-weekly basis and will keep you updated with the latest innovation in avoiding traffic using A.I.

Whether you're looking for DKV Mobility service stations or charging points in Europe or within your neighbourhood area, or whether you want to wash or park your vehicle, or even settle your refuelling bill with your smartphone: Our app is always there to guide you to the desired result in just a few steps.

Paying after refuelling directly in your car?

The APP&GO feature guides you through the entire refuelling process: from selecting the nearest APP&GO station to authorising payment - the DKV Mobility App remains available to help you save valuable time in your daily routine.

Charging your electric vehicle?

The new update of the DKV Mobility App not only gives you access to over 66,000 fuel stations, but to also more than 200,000 public charging points in our network. It's easy and is just one click away. Another unique feature is the intelligent route planning, where the DKV Mobility App automatically calculates the best route with optimal charging stops for long distances.

Need to find a station quickly?

With our new home screen, you have instant access to the station closest to you. You can check the price and start navigation right away.

Actively managing time windows in which the DKV CARD can be used?

The activation mode "on demand" offers the possibility to activate cards only for the period in which they are used for a transaction. During the rest of the time, the card is inactive, and transactions will be declined. Simply start the 60-minute time window during which fuel can be purchased. After the time has expired, the card is automatically deactivated again.

What other benefits does the DKV Mobility App offer?

If you need immediate assistance, for example in the event of a breakdown or the loss of your card, the app offers direct dialing to connect you to the helpline.

You can find more information about our range of services at https://www.dkv-mobility.com/en/. 

DKV. You drive, we care.

Parking has never been so easy:
· Start the park assist system in the vehicle and choose the right parking space
· Problems in tight spaces, multi-storey car parks and narrow garages are a thing of the past
· Stop. Get out. Get parked.

THE PARK ASSIST SYSTEM AT A GLANCE:
· Safe parking and manoeuvring – as if by magic
· Automatic scanning for roadside parking spaces
· Parking manoeuvre selection based on specific parking space
· Remote-controlled parking via app outside the vehicle

HERE’S HOW IT WORKS:
The Park Assist Plus app installed on your smartphone connects to your Touareg via Bluetooth.
As you arrive at your destination, start your park assist system in the vehicle and choose how you’d like to park (e.g. parallel).
The assist system checks the side of the road for available parking spaces of the right size and shows you on the display once it’s found what it’s looking for. When you switch the engine off, you can send the parking process to the app via the infotainment system and get out of the car, looking out for oncoming traffic.
You can now start the parking process in your Remote Parking Assistant app. The assist system takes control of your vehicle and parks in your chosen space by itself.
For safety reasons, you need to hold down the app’s Drive button at all times and stay close to the vehicle. When the process is complete, your Touareg is safely parked and locks automatically.
When you’d like to drive away in your Touareg, launch the app within range of your vehicle and select a parking manoeuvre. Your Touareg’s Park Assist Plus will manoeuvre your vehicle back out of the parking space, taking oncoming traffic into account.
When the selected manoeuvre is complete, you can get in your car and take the wheel.

Please note that the Volkswagen Park Assist Plus app is currently only available for use in the Touareg and with the relevant special equipment (‘Park Assist Plus – ready for remote-controlled parking’).

The details page shows the services offered on site as well as ratings from other users and the current occupancy of the parking spaces or loading ramp. Have the location displayed in your navigation app and be guided there directly.


Trucker Benefits
Benefits for your next purchase!
We believe that every driver should get the benefits that have long been standard in large companies. That's why we've built Trucker Benefits into our app. This gives you discounts on your next purchase at participating partners. The offer is wide-ranging and changes monthly. Just take a look and feel free to share your experiences on social media.



Reviews
Contribute to improvement together
We see giving you the opportunity to rate all locations in your everyday life as a chance to reveal the challenges and contribute to improvement through the resulting transparency. In doing so, we take great care to ensure that no false information is published and appeal to you to rate in a friendly and constructive manner in order to find solutions together.


Occupancy display
Inform each other about free parking spaces & waiting times!
In order to counteract the lack of parking spaces for trucks in Europe and to be able to plan loading and unloading better, the LKW APP offers the possibility of informing other drivers of the capacity utilisation at locations. The capacity utilisation information will be given to other drivers in summarised form.


Support
Making the LKW APP cool together!
In order to build up the digital buddy of the truck drivers together, we depend on open, honest and constructive feedback from our users. For this purpose, we offer the possibility to enter new locations via the support button on the main page, to give feedback on the app and to contact the aparkado team directly via a live chat.


Let's make the everyday life of lorry drivers better by working together on solutions and developing the LKW APP into the best app on the market. Better parking, better loading and above all better living! 
Will you help us make the job attractive again?


We look forward to hearing from you!


Your LKW APP team!

iMapp will help you track your friends and relatives who are connected to the service as well as assist you in finding a person's location by request, regardless of whether they have the app on their device installed.

Now, you no longer need to call each other dozens of times to arrange a meeting, you can simply view each other’s locations via a phone number. If all of your family members install the iMapp application, you will be able to know not only their current geolocation, but also the places in which they have visited during the past 60 days.

Install iMapp and you will be able to:

• track the location of your friends and relatives connected to the service 
• find out the location of any person; regardless of whether they have the app on their device installed (targeted devices should support HTML5)
• view the time list of location(s) of your friends for last 60 days
• get notifications when your friends arrive or leave from the places that you have created
• control the battery level of your friends and family's phones
• get directions to your friends, events, or any other places that you wish
• create your own places on the map
• share your location with your favorite friends in automatic mode
• use the program for tracking locations of children and relatives
• send the coordinates of a selected location using the most convenient way
• use the most energy-saving technology of location tracking.

The accuracy of coordinates whilst searching for devices using phone number or email depends on the availability of built-in GPS/GSM/WiFi modules on the targeted devices. In the case that there is no GPS, the coordinates are detected according to the data of cellular networks, with the accuracy ranging from 100 to 1000m. If there is no GPS and GSM, then the coordinates are detected via IP address. This function works by sending a unique message - that the app generates - to the phone number supplied which contains the location. The message will be opened every time when you want to update the person's location.

If you are involved in confidential matters, you may change your status in iMapp so that your mark is displayed only to your favorite friends; or you can make yourself invisible.
